other_tests.findings: The analysis of an intraoperative frozen section was consistent with low-grade glioma.
A region of higher metabolic activity within a predominantly low-grade tumor, with a choline-to-creatine ratio greater than 4:1.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Residual area of T2 hyperintensity did not enhance with gadolinium contrast medium and did not have characteristics of malignancy on subsequent imaging.

other_tests.findings: Initial CT showed a heterogeneous region of low attenuation in the right frontal lobe with mass effect. MRI revealed a nonenhancing right frontal-lobe lesion with some mass effect.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperative MRI showed a small amount of residual disease.

other_tests.findings: Demonstrated allelic loss for both 1p and 19q.
Showed some dorsolateral infiltrative signal, but the initial high-grade component was no longer present.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After chemotherapy, the patient's MRI showed no evidence of recurrence of the tumor.
